songs.title: What I want
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know I love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want, yeah

[Verse 1]
Why you hate a nigga, got me askin’ like why?
When I’m off the loud, swear a nigga finna fly
I be chasin’ green, til a nigga fuckin’ die
Swear I want this shit so bad, there’s no limit, pass the sky, yeah
I put a price on that, I spill rice on that, I know its like bang bang
[?]
Yes we blessed I know
Cuz I know we finna blow
I stay seein’ dough
And I’m gettin’ me some more

[Hook]
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know I love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know I love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want, yeah

[Verse 2]
I don’t play no games, in a jam, I don’t sellout man
I don’t ever pass that
They so lame they don’t ball like that, yeah
I’m just tryna get my bands up
Nigga why you hatin’ on the man, uh
Why you tryna speak when I write somethin’
Nigga thats left that ain’t right, yuh
Yeah why you do that?
Said why you do that nigga?
Watch who you shoot at nigga
Bounce back I threw that nigga
Yeah, yeah, why you in the crowd, aye, cuz, they don’t like his sound man

[Hook]
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know I love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want
I be makin’ money so I asked her “what you want?”
Niggas in my phone, got me askin’ “what you want?”
They just hate a nigga cuz they know I love to flaunt
But I don’t really care cuz I’m buyin’ what I want, yeah
What I want, what I want, yeah, what I want, what I want, yeah
